Kiva Rocks! I always re-loan my credit and give donations from time to time in order to ensure KIVA will grow and reach more people.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently unemployed with MS diagnostic since 08.2010, but still a lender!

lenders.name: BBfH c/o Greta
lenders.occupational_info:
Building Blocks for Humanity started when a few volunteers from the Anne Frank Museum Exhibit in Albuquerque, NM decided they still wanted to see each other and do good work.   

For seven years the group would have potluck dinners, through $5 - $10 in the kitty and kibbitz over dinner what organizations would recieve their funds.

Their mission statement was to support victims of terror or any organization bringing peace and a better life to the city, state, nation or the world.

The group has now become a simple supper group.  Kiva.org was one of the last things they did.  I have been charged with the duty to continue to give our 2 $25 donations to women throughout the world.

In addition to Kiva, this group has supported Madre, Naral, Righteous Christians (those that hid Jews in WWII), Friends of Mogan David of Israel, Heifer, and many more.

We hope our group will inspire others to do the same.  And we're happy to continue re-gifting our money here on Kiva.org.

lenders.name: Mrs. Handwerk
lenders.loan_because: We care.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because:
So I can feel like an international financier! 

I believe small investments in women yield large dividends in the world's collective future.

lenders.name: Ten
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to lead  a happy and fruitful life free from strife and fear. This is my contribution towards that aim.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an internet marketer and my goal is to motivate as many people as possible around the globe to enter the online community whether it is to start their own web business or simply to share their thoughts in a blog.  I believe that the internet is the only truly democratic forum available to the people of the world and that it can be a power for good as Kiva has clearly proved.

lenders.occupational_info: We have a non profit restaurant using seasonal and local ingredients with one day a week as a pay if you can basis.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I want to do what I can to make the world a better place. It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are: 
a) Successful in their business and continue to build their business even through difficult times.
b) Find ways to shape their business so it helps themselves and at the same time helps other people and also does no harm to other people or the environment.
c) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to further their own education in ways that are focused on improving their business.  
d) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to advance the education of their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters).
e) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to provide for their own retirement
f) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to become a Kiva lender and make loans to others.

I believe one of the most important things that the people who receive my Kiva loans can do with their money after their business is running smoothly is to advance the education for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters). It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are able to somehow find a way for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters) to attend at least high school and 2 years of college leading to a High School Diploma and Associate Degree. Through education we are better able to understand and help ourselves, our family, our business, our community and the world.

If any of the people who have received my loans are having difficulty finding educational opportunities that they can afford that will help their business or they are having difficulty finding ways for themselves or their children to pursue a High School Diploma or Associate Degree then I encourage them to contact me and I will try to assist them.
lenders.occupational_info: An electrical engineer is a  person who designs industrial and consumer items that use electricity including computers, network appliances, radios, televisions, electrical motors/generators, electrical power distribution systems and communications systems. I am a vegetarian and I volunteer with the American  Red Cross. Some of my hobbies include amateur radio, amateur astronomy, general aviation, yoga, meditation, ballroom dancing and Tae Kwon Do.
